original_text: Then the man and his wife heard the sound of the Lord God as he was walking in the garden in the cool of the day, and they hid from the Lord God among the trees of the garden.
korean_text: 그들이 그 날 바람이 불 때 동산에 거니시는 여호와 하나님의 소리를 듣고 아담과 그의 아내가 여호와 하나님의 낯을 피하여 동산 나무 사이에 숨은지라

sentences.original_text: Then the man and his wife heard the sound of the Lord God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 남자와 그의 아내가 주 하나님의 소리를 들었으니

sentences.original_text: as he was walking in the garden
in the cool of the day
and they hid from the Lord God
among the trees of the garden
